Paginations

class apps.product.paginations.CustomNumberPagination

Custom pagination class based on PageNumberPagination in Django Rest Framework.

This class extends the default PageNumberPagination and customizes the pagination settings for a specific use case.

Attributes: - page_size (int): The number of items to include on each page. Defaults to 5. - page_size_query_param (str): The query parameter to determine the page size.

Defaults to “page_size”.

  • max_page_size (int): The maximum allowed value for the page size. Defaults to 15.

  • page_query_param (str): The query parameter to determine the requested page number.

    Defaults to “page”.

max_page_size = 15
page_query_param = 'page'
page_size = 5
page_size_query_param = 'page_size'
